sentences.sContent: You can't simply wave a wand and get rid of nuclear weapons.
sentences.sCn: 你们不可能一挥魔杖就消除核武器。

synos.tran: 魔杖；棒；权杖；[植]嫩枝；识别笔（等于wand reader）

trans.tranCn: 魔杖；棒；权杖；嫩枝；识别笔（等于wand reader）
trans.tranOther: a thin stick that you hold in your hand to do magic tricks

trans.tranCn: 用扫描笔在…上扫描条形码
trans.tranOther: to move a small scanner over something or someone
